typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Tcrossreference
Tcrossreference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID == 774) ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(inserted_by = 'M_PRE_DIM_CLAIM_TYPE',
		last_updated_by = 'M_PRE_DIM_CLAIM_TYPE',
		date_inserted = currentTimestamp(),
		date_last_updated = currentTimestamp(),
		pk_key_clm = concat(SOURCE_SYSTEM, SOURCE_CODE_KEY),
		clm_description = substring(TARGET_DESCRIPTION, 1, 40)) ~> Constant
Constant select(mapColumn(
		clm_source_system = SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		clm_code = TARGET_CODE,
		clm_source_key = SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
		inserted_by,
		last_updated_by,
		date_inserted,
		date_last_updated,
		pk_key_clm,
		clm_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(partitionFileNames:['pre_dim_claim_type'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
